thread.title: Sir John Major warns of costs of Brexit
thread.title_full: Sir John Major warns of costs of Brexit

title: Sir John Major warns of costs of Brexit
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Sir John Major warns of costs of Brexit 27 February 2017 Last updated at 22:56 GMT 
Sir John Major has warned that voters are being given over-optimistic expectations about Brexit. 
In a speech in London, the former prime minister said the costs of leaving the European Union could be higher than those of being a member. Read more
